title: ResourceResult holds the operation result details of a specific resource

group.title: Group specifies the API group of the resource

hookPhase.description:
HookPhase contains the state of any operation associated with this resource OR hook
This can also contain values for non-hook resources.

hookType.title: HookType specifies the type of the hook. Empty for non-hook resources

kind.title: Kind specifies the API kind of the resource

message.title: Message contains an informational or error message for the last sync OR operation

name.title: Name specifies the name of the resource

namespace.title: Namespace specifies the target namespace of the resource

status.title: Status holds the final result of the sync. Will be empty if the resources is yet to be applied/pruned and is always zero-value for hooks

syncPhase.title: SyncPhase indicates the particular phase of the sync that this result was acquired in

version.title: Version specifies the API version of the resource
